name: inventory-application
description: Your Inventory app should have categories and items, so when the user goes to the home-page they can choose a category to view, and then get a list of every item in that category. You should include all of the CRUD methods for both items and categories, so anybody thatâ€™s visiting the site can Create, Read, Update or Delete any Item or Category.

scripts.db:reset: dotenv -e .env -- psql "$DATABASE_URL" -v ON_ERROR_STOP=1 -c "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS items, categories CASCADE;" && npm run db:schema && npm run db:seed
